name: Cybermind (Dom Sleighthome)
description:
The year is 2550 and the galaxy is in deep despair and chaos. Earth was evacuated a hundred years ago after the civil war between the rich and poor destroyed the Earth and made into it a wasteland unsafe for humans to live on. Former Soldier Curtis Riley is tasked with going to one of the last war zones in the civil war, Mars. This Planet has not made contact with anyone for weeks and its starting to get fishy, maybe the zombie text subjects escaped... We better find out.

This game has been created by a University student, this game has been handed in but still a work in progress, I will add more stuff to the game to make much more of a fun and action packed experience.
